body: I'm in the US, and most churches here frown upon people who choose not to marry or act in suspicion of them. I think they feel like getting married and having children is an obligation, and people who don't are refusing and neglecting their life's duty. That's not what Jesus thought, but they don't seem to care as usual. They're more concerned about birthrates and keeping the white population up. They may also dislike unmarried people because they see celibacy as a "Catholic" thing, or because marrying is a good way to prove someone isn't gay. They particularly frown upon unmarried women, likely because they have this idea that women are only good for being fucked, having kiddies, and doing housework, and a single woman is too independent and not submissive enough for them, and therefore "feminist". Men too though, are usually expected to make finding a mate a priority, just not as harshly or as early as they're given more leeway to focus on finishing college and/or settling down with a stable career first.
body_html: I'm in the US, and most churches here frown upon people who choose not to marry or act in suspicion of them. I think they feel like getting married and having children is an obligation, and people who don't are refusing and neglecting their life's duty. That's not what Jesus thought, but they don't seem to care as usual. They're more concerned about birthrates and keeping the white population up. They may also dislike unmarried people because they see celibacy as a "Catholic" thing, or because marrying is a good way to prove someone isn't gay. They particularly frown upon unmarried women, likely because they have this idea that women are only good for being fucked, having kiddies, and doing housework, and a single woman is too independent and not submissive enough for them, and therefore "feminist". Men too though, are usually expected to make finding a mate a priority, just not as harshly or as early as they're given more leeway to focus on finishing college and/or settling down with a stable career first.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

parent.body: What part of the world are you in?   My experience is the opposite.  You are looked down on for having a family.  Seen as costing more.  Requiring more. Seen as having conflicting obligations.
parent.body_html: What part of the world are you in? My experience is the opposite. You are looked down on for having a family. Seen as costing more. Requiring more. Seen as having conflicting obligations.

post.body:
From nearly every pulpit these days, it is repeated day in and day out, and the message is clear. Your duty as a man is to marry a woman, go to work, have kids, and rule the home. Your duty as a woman is to marry a man, become a housewife, act soft and feminine, and have kids. Ideally, each person should have 2.5 kids and a middle class suburban home. Single people are looked down on and shamed. Even within married couples, people who don't or can't have kids, don't strictly follow traditional gender roles, marry interracially, don't blindly support everything certain political figures do, etc. are not welcomed. And if your family has a bad reputation, you do too, because badness runs in families apparently. And biological family is always more important than everyone else, including even adopted children. And the stereotypical 1950s family is obviously the core tenant of the Christian faith, and even the slightest deviation from this ideal is the devil. Never mind the fact that Jesus praised people who didn't marry and taught people to leave their "family values" behind to follow him. He must just be a demonic agent sent to destroy the nuclear family!

This is a serious problem. It's gotten to the point where many of you talk about literally nothing else. People who choose not to marry are sinning, is how it gets treated, and so severely that it needs to be fought against every chance you get. As if the sole purpose of life is to marry and have kids, and anyone who doesn't do that, exactly the way it would look on a 50s show, is neglecting their biggest duty and committing an unforgivable sin. Not marrying and having kids is simply unacceptable many say, *especially* if you're a woman, but often men too.

Is there a particular reason why this is such a huge deal now? What exactly is wrong with someone whose calling is not marrying and creating a stereotypical family?
post.body_html:
From nearly every pulpit these days, it is repeated day in and day out, and the message is clear. Your duty as a man is to marry a woman, go to work, have kids, and rule the home. Your duty as a woman is to marry a man, become a housewife, act soft and feminine, and have kids. Ideally, each person should have 2.5 kids and a middle class suburban home. Single people are looked down on and shamed. Even within married couples, people who don't or can't have kids, don't strictly follow traditional gender roles, marry interracially, don't blindly support everything certain political figures do, etc. are not welcomed. And if your family has a bad reputation, you do too, because badness runs in families apparently. And biological family is always more important than everyone else, including even adopted children. And the stereotypical 1950s family is obviously the core tenant of the Christian faith, and even the slightest deviation from this ideal is the devil. Never mind the fact that Jesus praised people who didn't marry and taught people to leave their "family values" behind to follow him. He must just be a demonic agent sent to destroy the nuclear family!

This is a serious problem. It's gotten to the point where many of you talk about literally nothing else. People who choose not to marry are sinning, is how it gets treated, and so severely that it needs to be fought against every chance you get. As if the sole purpose of life is to marry and have kids, and anyone who doesn't do that, exactly the way it would look on a 50s show, is neglecting their biggest duty and committing an unforgivable sin. Not marrying and having kids is simply unacceptable many say, especially if you're a woman, but often men too.

Is there a particular reason why this is such a huge deal now? What exactly is wrong with someone whose calling is not marrying and creating a stereotypical family?
post.title: I feel like we're making an idol of the nuclear family

body:
> It doesn't. When did I ever say that?

It evidently does, because the heavens and earth will pass away, and the spirit and flesh are opposed.

> How so?

Because it's the result of the fall and a broken reality, and you insist that it should dictate God's actions.

> No, it needs human "tampering" to protect it and to allow humans a more secure life.

So when someone complains about it in a way *you* don't like you say those are just the rules, too bad, sucks to be you loser, but when you think it needs changed in a different way that's all of a sudden completely fine.

> Plenty of times.

Yeah, they're good at pretending to, but it's nearly always a selfish motive disguised as charity. That's how power structures work, and our tribalistic and hierarchical minds are gullible to it.

> yes, it is, but you seem to be the anarchist type that views any civilization or government as going against nature/God, when that definitely isn't the case.

You dodged my calling out of your hypocrisy about calling constructions about nature bad but supporting certain human tampering yourself. But while we're on this subject, civilizations and governments, as you see them, *are* bad and going against God. They're not necessarily against nature, as extreme hierarchy and divisions with elite ruling classes are the primal default. But they are bad, and although allowed by God for a reason are still by Satan (Matthew 4, 1 Samuel 8).
body_html:
It doesn't. When did I ever say that?

It evidently does, because the heavens and earth will pass away, and the spirit and flesh are opposed.

How so?

Because it's the result of the fall and a broken reality, and you insist that it should dictate God's actions.

No, it needs human "tampering" to protect it and to allow humans a more secure life.

So when someone complains about it in a way you don't like you say those are just the rules, too bad, sucks to be you loser, but when you think it needs changed in a different way that's all of a sudden completely fine.

Plenty of times.

Yeah, they're good at pretending to, but it's nearly always a selfish motive disguised as charity. That's how power structures work, and our tribalistic and hierarchical minds are gullible to it.

yes, it is, but you seem to be the anarchist type that views any civilization or government as going against nature/God, when that definitely isn't the case.

You dodged my calling out of your hypocrisy about calling constructions about nature bad but supporting certain human tampering yourself. But while we're on this subject, civilizations and governments, as you see them, are bad and going against God. They're not necessarily against nature, as extreme hierarchy and divisions with elite ruling classes are the primal default. But they are bad, and although allowed by God for a reason are still by Satan (Matthew 4, 1 Samuel 8).

parent.body:
> Tell me, if nature is so good in its current state then why does it need to be completely destroyed and rebuilt from scratch?

It doesn't. When did I ever say that?

> You have made "nature" into an idol and placed it above God

How so?

> And you say it needs human tampering to make it better? More of that is the last thing we need!

No, it needs human "tampering" to protect it and to allow humans a more secure life.

> When have humans ever done anything more than create self-serving power structures for the elites in charge

Plenty of times.

> Indeed, is that not what you're already complaining about when you say "Constructions that go against them are"?

yes, it is, but you seem to be the anarchist type that views any civilization or government as going against nature/God, when that definitely isn't the case.
parent.body_html:
Tell me, if nature is so good in its current state then why does it need to be completely destroyed and rebuilt from scratch?

It doesn't. When did I ever say that?

You have made "nature" into an idol and placed it above God

How so?

And you say it needs human tampering to make it better? More of that is the last thing we need!

No, it needs human "tampering" to protect it and to allow humans a more secure life.

When have humans ever done anything more than create self-serving power structures for the elites in charge

Plenty of times.

Indeed, is that not what you're already complaining about when you say "Constructions that go against them are"?

yes, it is, but you seem to be the anarchist type that views any civilization or government as going against nature/God, when that definitely isn't the case.

post.body:
From nearly every pulpit these days, it is repeated day in and day out, and the message is clear. Your duty as a man is to marry a woman, go to work, have kids, and rule the home. Your duty as a woman is to marry a man, become a housewife, act soft and feminine, and have kids. Ideally, each person should have 2.5 kids and a middle class suburban home. Single people are looked down on and shamed. Even within married couples, people who don't or can't have kids, don't strictly follow traditional gender roles, marry interracially, don't blindly support everything certain political figures do, etc. are not welcomed. And if your family has a bad reputation, you do too, because badness runs in families apparently. And biological family is always more important than everyone else, including even adopted children. And the stereotypical 1950s family is obviously the core tenant of the Christian faith, and even the slightest deviation from this ideal is the devil. Never mind the fact that Jesus praised people who didn't marry and taught people to leave their "family values" behind to follow him. He must just be a demonic agent sent to destroy the nuclear family!

This is a serious problem. It's gotten to the point where many of you talk about literally nothing else. People who choose not to marry are sinning, is how it gets treated, and so severely that it needs to be fought against every chance you get. As if the sole purpose of life is to marry and have kids, and anyone who doesn't do that, exactly the way it would look on a 50s show, is neglecting their biggest duty and committing an unforgivable sin. Not marrying and having kids is simply unacceptable many say, *especially* if you're a woman, but often men too.

Is there a particular reason why this is such a huge deal now? What exactly is wrong with someone whose calling is not marrying and creating a stereotypical family?

body: It's because biologically, males are disposable and specialized specifically for giving sperm, defending the family or clan, and working. Therefore they aren't given as much empathy and are more easily shamed, as they aren't important on their own, they only have value in what they do. Of course this is completely unfair, but it is the biological reason we give so much more leeway and validation to women, it's just in our primal instincts to do so.

From nearly every pulpit these days, it is repeated day in and day out, and the message is clear. Your duty as a man is to marry a woman, go to work, have kids, and rule the home. Your duty as a woman is to marry a man, become a housewife, act soft and feminine, and have kids. Ideally, each person should have 2.5 kids and a middle class suburban home. Single people are looked down on and shamed. Even within married couples, people who don't or can't have kids, don't strictly follow traditional gender roles, marry interracially, don't blindly support everything certain political figures do, etc. are not welcomed. body:
This whole article is basically just "people with a vagina just need to shut up, be lesser in every way, have no autonomy, and get a husband to rule over them while they have lots of kiddies and do pointless housework, but this totally isn't lesser or anything, it's just different!". Then they cite the pastoral epistles (not written by who they say they are), an interpolation in 1 Corinthians, and an out-of-context quote in Genesis as proof texts. Then then proceed to quote 10x more from "church fathers" who had an obvious agenda to make Christianity conform to Greco-Roman values. I also find it funny how they contrast the "biblical" narrative of woman only exists to be fucked, slave, and birth your kiddies with the "Darwinist" belief that the sexes are equal...when it's the reverse, as Charles Darwin used evolution as a way to claim that females are naturally inferior to males and that this was proper, eerily similar to the pagans' and Roman church fathers' beliefs about conforming to what is "natural", "women are pieces of meat" being one of them. Meanwhile all evidence we have shows that early Christian communities thought the opposite, which would have been considered off the wall insanity in the ancient world.

They also say that women need men but not the other way around, which is just a flat out lie. Every study shows that most men are only happy with a woman, but women can do fine without men. This is because males perform a specialized function of giving away sperm and providing for and protecting their clan. Their value is not inherent, but in what they do, and thus they need a mate and people to support; their purpose in life is external and collectivist. However the female is more generalized and capable of both individual pursuits and family life, so they don't absolutely need a mate to find purpose. And since the writers of this article have a habit of reading too much into Genesis, it should be noted that it was the man who was so lonely without a companion, and it was the man who needed help.

This whole article is basically just "people with a vagina just need to shut up, be lesser in every way, have no autonomy, and get a husband to rule over them while they have lots of kiddies and do pointless housework, but this totally isn't lesser or anything, it's just different!". Then they cite the pastoral epistles (not written by who they say they are), an interpolation in 1 Corinthians, and an out-of-context quote in Genesis as proof texts. Then then proceed to quote 10x more from "church fathers" who had an obvious agenda to make Christianity conform to Greco-Roman values. I also find it funny how they contrast the "biblical" narrative of woman only exists to be fucked, slave, and birth your kiddies with the "Darwinist" belief that the sexes are equal...when it's the reverse, as Charles Darwin used evolution as a way to claim that females are naturally inferior to males and that this was proper, eerily similar to the pagans' and Roman church fathers' beliefs about conforming to what is "natural", "women are pieces of meat" being one of them. Meanwhile all evidence we have shows that early Christian communities thought the opposite, which would have been considered off the wall insanity in the ancient world.

They also say that women need men but not the other way around, which is just a flat out lie. Every study shows that most men are only happy with a woman, but women can do fine without men. This is because males perform a specialized function of giving away sperm and providing for and protecting their clan. Their value is not inherent, but in what they do, and thus they need a mate and people to support; their purpose in life is external and collectivist. However the female is more generalized and capable of both individual pursuits and family life, so they don't absolutely need a mate to find purpose. And since the writers of this article have a habit of reading too much into Genesis, it should be noted that it was the man who was so lonely without a companion, and it was the man who needed help.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.title: After unjustly banning @milkit and illegitimately sieging and purging his guilds, The Cabal is already plotting their next takeover

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
1. firexq protested against the banning of loli guilds and was banned for "cp" despite the fact that he never posted cp. This was later reversed.

2. DGKSK8LIFE was banned with a loophole. The admins for some reason had promoted him to part of their core coding team, and he put it on his profile. However, after they got into fights with each other captainmeta4 removed him from this position, then *perma*banned him for "impersonation" because he hadn't updated his profile within 1 nanosecond of being demoted.

3. klenvastergan was banned for "spam" because the admins found his posts unfunny. Before that he was also banned for modding > 10 guilds, after the admins specifically made that a rule on the fly so they could ban him.

4. JosephGoebbels was apparently permabanned for "modding more than 10 guilds" which he says he never did. The admins secretly told the discord mods and RCP about it so they could immediately go and siege his guilds. This was reversed after being called out. It was also found that 2 of the discord users who sieged his guilds were evading the cooldown, which the admins reluctantly gave a *one day* ban for.

5. Xigbar68 and DarkForge were banned for "harassment" for calling out the RCP and the admins' special treatment of discord mods. I was also threatened with the same ban twice. Meanwhile the discord VIPs continued to go around telling everyone to kill themselves with no consequences.

6. sfrohne was permabanned for "cp" after reposting someone else's post that contained a link to a *google search* about child pornography. Cap himself then posted a screenshot of that post *uncensored* on discord, which he and his discord buddies continued to share both on discord and ruqqus with no repercussions.
body_html:
1. firexq protested against the banning of loli guilds and was banned for "cp" despite the fact that he never posted cp. This was later reversed.

  2. DGKSK8LIFE was banned with a loophole. The admins for some reason had promoted him to part of their core coding team, and he put it on his profile. However, after they got into fights with each other captainmeta4 removed him from this position, then permabanned him for "impersonation" because he hadn't updated his profile within 1 nanosecond of being demoted.

  3. klenvastergan was banned for "spam" because the admins found his posts unfunny. Before that he was also banned for modding > 10 guilds, after the admins specifically made that a rule on the fly so they could ban him.

  4. JosephGoebbels was apparently permabanned for "modding more than 10 guilds" which he says he never did. The admins secretly told the discord mods and RCP about it so they could immediately go and siege his guilds. This was reversed after being called out. It was also found that 2 of the discord users who sieged his guilds were evading the cooldown, which the admins reluctantly gave a one day ban for.

  5. Xigbar68 and DarkForge were banned for "harassment" for calling out the RCP and the admins' special treatment of discord mods. I was also threatened with the same ban twice. Meanwhile the discord VIPs continued to go around telling everyone to kill themselves with no consequences.

  6. sfrohne was permabanned for "cp" after reposting someone else's post that contained a link to a google search about child pornography. Cap himself then posted a screenshot of that post uncensored on discord, which he and his discord buddies continued to share both on discord and ruqqus with no repercussions.

body: It is. Fundy is actually the best example right now because he's the newest channel, and you can clearly see that he only has about 30 videos all of which date to the past year. Dream did the exact same thing but he's a lot older and it's not as noticeable anymore. But you can see how each of them gets like 3 slots at the top of everyones' suggestions. While everyone else hardly ever even gets one unless you watch them a lot already, and people with 10x more subscribers than them don't get anywhere near as many views.

guild.description: For all your conspiracy theories.

guild.name: Conspiracy

parent.body: I don't watch minecraft videos, but when I heard about Dream through the speedrun cheating scandal, I did notice that their growth seemed rather suspicious.
parent.body_html: I don't watch minecraft videos, but when I heard about Dream through the speedrun cheating scandal, I did notice that their growth seemed rather suspicious.

post.body:
I first started noticing this when Dream, and his associates George, Fundy, etc. all started getting millions of views on every single video, without a *single* failure. Their videos are thrown all through everyones' suggestions at an absurd rate. Some of them only have like 20 videos total and have almost 3 million subscribers, which they gained from 0 in *less than a year*.

As you can tell this is beyond absurd. Even the biggest YouTubers of all time are nowhere close to that. And youtube has been known to have industry plants, the most famous example being that girl who lives in a van. I've known this since July.

However there's been other very weird activity lately concerning other youtubers. Right as this started happening, all the other major minecraft channels went kinda dormant or even completely quit. Most of the ones that didn't got demonetized, terminated, or forced to rebrand.

What little activity these channels do have though, is *worshipping Dream and his associates*. This is way too big of a coincidence. If Dream is being employed by YouTube as I suspect they are, then it's not too big of a stretch to think that maybe YouTube or Dream is bribing the others to quit so the Dream Team gets more of the spotlight.

Even popular channels outside of the minecraft realm are susceptible to this. In the past year alone, not only did nearly every popular minecraft channel quit at the same time, but SMG4 went more cringe than ever and started promoting Dream, SuperMarioLogan got a cease and desist and is likely to get terminated, tons of popular channels got terminated, and the ones that are left either quit or started worshipping Dream like crazy. ExplodingTNT "took a break" and Pink Sheep's videos suddenly went from hilarious to so cringe it had to have been on purpose, all at the exact same time he started shilling for Dream, and at the exact same time every other MC channel did the same thing.
post.body_html:
I first started noticing this when Dream, and his associates George, Fundy, etc. all started getting millions of views on every single video, without a single failure. Their videos are thrown all through everyones' suggestions at an absurd rate. Some of them only have like 20 videos total and have almost 3 million subscribers, which they gained from 0 in less than a year.

As you can tell this is beyond absurd. Even the biggest YouTubers of all time are nowhere close to that. And youtube has been known to have industry plants, the most famous example being that girl who lives in a van. I've known this since July.

However there's been other very weird activity lately concerning other youtubers. Right as this started happening, all the other major minecraft channels went kinda dormant or even completely quit. Most of the ones that didn't got demonetized, terminated, or forced to rebrand.

What little activity these channels do have though, is worshipping Dream and his associates. This is way too big of a coincidence. If Dream is being employed by YouTube as I suspect they are, then it's not too big of a stretch to think that maybe YouTube or Dream is bribing the others to quit so the Dream Team gets more of the spotlight.

Even popular channels outside of the minecraft realm are susceptible to this. In the past year alone, not only did nearly every popular minecraft channel quit at the same time, but SMG4 went more cringe than ever and started promoting Dream, SuperMarioLogan got a cease and desist and is likely to get terminated, tons of popular channels got terminated, and the ones that are left either quit or started worshipping Dream like crazy. ExplodingTNT "took a break" and Pink Sheep's videos suddenly went from hilarious to so cringe it had to have been on purpose, all at the exact same time he started shilling for Dream, and at the exact same time every other MC channel did the same thing.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
